mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Administrator (administrator_id, administrator_name, password, privilege_level, status, create_at) VALUE (#{administratorId}, #{administratorName}, password(#{password}), #{privilegeLevel}, #{status}, #{createAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE Administrator SET administrator_name = #{administratorName}, password = password(#{password}), privilege_level = #{privilegeLevel}, status = #{status} WHERE administrator_id = #{administratorId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Administrator WHERE administrator_name = #{administratorName} AND password = password(#{password})
